code-table.definition: The stage of software development of this item (project, task or resource).

item.label: Concept
item.definition: This item (task or project) is only in the concept stage a no efforts have been taken to get approval for this item.

item.label: Pending Approval
item.definition: This item is pending approval by the business and finanacial teams.

item.label: Approved
item.definition: This item is approved for development.

item.label: Scheduled
item.definition: The development of this item is currently being scheduled

item.label: Requirments
item.definition: This item is currently having requirements gathered

item.label: Design
item.definition: This item is in the a design phase.

item.label: Testing
item.definition: This item is in the testing or quality assurance phase.

item.label: Production
item.definition: This item is in production and is being used by customers.

item.label: Obsolete
item.definition: This item is no longer supported and should not be used.
